original_title: Sound & Fury: Testaclese & Ye Sack of Rome!
overview: Sound & Fury's flagship show, has been performed over 2,000 times. It's a bawdy tale, of enormous proportions. If you know what we mean. See it and have a ball! Bad puns, adventure and a healthy dose of cross-dressing, as usual ensue.
title: Sound & Fury: Testaclese & Ye Sack of Rome!
